attributes.action: Give the public the option to vote not only in favour of an e-petition, but also against it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A member of the public should be given the opportunity not only to put forward an e-petition, and sign in favour of an e-petition, but also the opportunity to disagree with a particular e-petition, and demonstrate such disagreement via the option to sign against it.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
